Introduction
This topic provides information on the authorization activity’s responsibility for requesting the appointment of a fiduciary in some cases involving incompetent and minor beneficiaries, including
circumstances under which it is appropriate to request the appointment (certification) of a fiduciary
requesting appointment of a fiduciary for insurance proceeds
preparing
VA Form 21-592, Request for Appointment of a Fiduciary, Custodian or Guardian
, to request the appointment of a fiduciary
fiduciary hub (hub) jurisdictions and contact information
referring status inquiries after uploading
VA Form 21-592
requesting a temporary fiduciary
restricting notification to anyone outside of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) of a pending request for fiduciary appointment
, and
handling incoming fiduciary-related documents and correspondence
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section C - General Information on Incompetency and Fiduciary Cases
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section C
